thread.title: DOCUMENTS: Lamar Odom and Khloe Kardashian withdraw divorce papers
thread.title_full: DOCUMENTS: Lamar Odom and Khloe Kardashian withdraw divorce papers

title: DOCUMENTS: Lamar Odom and Khloe Kardashian withdraw divorce papers
text:
Share Updated: 2:24 pm LOS ANGELES (AP) - Lamar Odom and Khloe Kardashian have decided to stay married as the former NBA star continues his recovery a week after he was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel.Kardashian's lawyer, Laura Wasser, went before a Los Angeles judge Wednesday to withdraw divorce papers filed in December 2013. The judge granted the request.The one-page document signed by Odom and Kardashian was submitted without prejudice, which means it can be refiled at later date.Kardashian has been by Odom's side since he was found in extremely critical condition Oct. 13 at the Love Ranch brothel in the rural community of Crystal, Nevada. He regained consciousness Friday and was transported to Los Angeles on Monday to recover.
According to TMZ, Khloe waited a year and a half "because she tried to save her marriage by trying to get Lamar into rehab." 
The website claims she gave up that quest this summer.
